message: Be a problem or be a part of the solution by doing something. protesting on the highway, blocking traffic and inconveniencing the people who have nothing to do with the problem is not solving anything it is however causing another problem... how about doing something to solve the crime both in the Brigham's in the police force?? No you'd rather point out someone else's problems, get out and do something positive instead of causing more problems. I don't have to ask you anything, I wanted your perspective but you've proven you don't have a perspective but are just on the bandwagon wanting attention without and drive to make a difference.
